name: tigerish
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
very determined and strong: She is quite small, but she has a tigerish spirit. The orchestra attacks the fast movements with tigerish energy.
More examplesFewer examplesThe head coach put his team's success down to its tigerish defence.His tigerish tackling has made him a firm favourite with the fans.Despite his friendly image, he could be a tigerish interviewer when the occasion called for it.Some of the females would protect their young with a tigerish ferocity.
